name: The Xmas Curse Demo
description:
It's Christmas Eve, and you're home alone. Bored, you open a present early in secret.

˙ʇ,upɐɥ noʎ ɥsᴉʍ ll,no⅄

The Xmas Curse is a very short (~2m gameplay) PSX horror and platforming experience developed for Santa Jam 2022 which I worked on from 14 Dec 2022 to 1 Jan 2023. It contains a demo's worth of content, so I may expand on it in the future.

Attributions:

Free Footsteps Sound Effects by Mayra, https://mayragandra.itch.io/free-footsteps-sound-effects
